name: An Exploration of Spaces
description:
This project was created for my Independent Study on Level Design at Marshall University under the Tutelage of Matt Mundell. Built over the course of a semester this is a series of 13 levels, each level based upon a different chapter of Chris Totten's "An Architectural Approach to Level Design." Each level is of varying quality, showcasing my initial journey of learning Level Design and advancing my design methodology. 

Credit to: Aedan Graves for the FirstPersonController Asset from the Unity Asset Store. Made My life so much easier.

-Special Thanks to Matt Mundell for being an amazing professor these past 4 years.
-Thank you as well to Chris Totten for being an awesome writer and person and for helping me try and sort through his work.
-Thank you to Norma Tu for being a massive mentor in my life and helping me keep organized with the semester when I needed the help.
